title: Robert Lewandowski wanted by another MLS club as Barcelona star talks future
body_text:
MLS side Orlando City have become the latest club to be linked with a move for Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski.
Robert Lewandowski wanted by another MLS club as Barcelona star talks future
Interest seems to be rising in the striker.
The Poland star is heading towards the end of his Barcelona contract, meaning there’s plenty of talk about where he may play his football next season.
Chicago Fire and AC Milan have both been credited with interest already, with a new report from Kanal Sportowy claiming Orlando City are also keen and willing to offer Lewandowski a lucrative transfer.
As for Lewandowski, he’s been talking to YouTuber TheGrefg and seems pretty relaxed about his future.
”It depends on how I feel. Physically, I feel good and also mentally, but what my heart tells me also influences and right now I don’t have big plans for the future,” he said.
Lewandowski also went on to say “he is not in a hurry” to decide his future and it seems like he’s yet to decide his next move.
